sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO t_device_info (FdeviceId, Fimei, Fmac, Fmac2, Fextr, FappVer,FchannelId,FplatType, FclientIp, Fstate, FcreateTime,FmodifyTime) VALUES (#deviceId#, #imei#, #mac#, #mac2#, #extr#, #appVer#,#channelId#,#platType#, #clientIp#, #state#, NOW(), NOW())
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS itemId
